mapper.insert:
insert into jm_xj_mf (sid,hpdate,sbuid,smake,moditime,chk_man,state,creftimes,rs_no,mo_no,prd_no,bat_no,zc_no,xjid,wk_no,sorg,zx_code,qty_cur,qty_ok, qty_lost,spc_chk,spc_btn,chk_id,op_rem,fin_judge,xjms,xjjd,test_bo,md_no,first_chk,aspect_chk,inter_chk,welc_chk,jb_no,qcopper,hcopper,zcopper,plastic, rohs,techno,chk_rem,rm_name,wk_name) values
(#{jmXjMfDTO.sid}, #{jmXjMfDTO.hpdate}, #{jmXjMfDTO.sbuid}, #{jmXjMfDTO.smake},#{jmXjMfDTO.moditime},#{jmXjMfDTO.chkMan},#{jmXjMfDTO.state}, #{jmXjMfDTO.creftimes},#{jmXjMfDTO.rsNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.moNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.prdNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.batNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.zcNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.xjid}, #{jmXjMfDTO.wkNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.sorg},#{jmXjMfDTO.zxCode},cast(#{jmXjMfDTO.qtyCur,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)), cast(#{jmXjMfDTO.qtyOk,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)),cast(#{jmXjMfDTO.qtyLost,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)), #{jmXjMfDTO.spcChk},#{jmXjMfDTO.spcBtn},#{jmXjMfDTO.chkId},#{jmXjMfDTO.opRem},#{jmXjMfDTO.finJudge},#{jmXjMfDTO.xjms},#{jmXjMfDTO.xjjd}, #{jmXjMfDTO.testBo},#{jmXjMfDTO.mdNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.firstChk},#{jmXjMfDTO.aspectChk},#{jmXjMfDTO.interChk},#{jmXjMfDTO.welcChk}, #{jmXjMfDTO.jbNo},#{jmXjMfDTO.qcopper},#{jmXjMfDTO.hcopper},#{jmXjMfDTO.zcopper},#{jmXjMfDTO.plastic},#{jmXjMfDTO.rohs}, #{jmXjMfDTO.techno},#{jmXjMfDTO.chkRem},#{jmXjMfDTO.rmName},#{jmXjMfDTO.wkName})
